<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Furious Vengeance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1628) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[fury instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=3)

**Trigger**
An enemy within your melee reach critically hits you with a melee Strike.

</column>

---

Your enemy's blow fuels your rage and provokes your immediate retaliation. Make a melee Strike against the triggering enemy.
name: Furious Vengeance
